unnormalised: Entertainment: Chai Pe Charcha Hotter Than Ever!
normalised: Entertainment: Chai Pe Charcha Hotter Than Ever!

unnormalised: Spill the chai, folks! Seems like things are getting spicy in Bollywood land. Rumour has it, Isha Sharma, fresh off her National School of Drama stint, was spotted getting *very* cosy with Ranbir Kapoor… not on set!
normalised: Spill the chai, folks! Seems like things are getting spicy in Bollywood land. Rumour has it, Isha Sharma, fresh off her National School of Drama stint, was spotted getting very cosy with Ranbir Kapoor… not on set!

unnormalised: Insiders at Dharma Productions are whispering that his wife, Alia Bhatt, is "not amused," especially considering Ranbir and Isha are reportedly working on a new project together.
normalised: Insiders at Dharma Productions are whispering that his wife, Alia Bhatt, is "not amused," especially considering Ranbir and Isha are reportedly working on a new project together.

unnormalised: Sources tell us the duo was seen leaving Olive Bar & Kitchen late Tuesday night. Coincidence? We think NOT!
normalised: Sources tell us the duo was seen leaving Olive Bar and Kitchen late Tuesday night. Coincidence? We think NOT!

unnormalised: And the plot thickens! Turns out, Isha was also previously linked to Vicky Kaushal back in her NSD days. Talk about a small world!
normalised: And the plot thickens! Turns out, Isha was also previously linked to Vicky Kaushal back in her N S D days. Talk about a small world!

unnormalised: Is this just friendly collegiality, or is there some real DDLJ-style romance brewing? Stay tuned for more updates, because this drama is juicier than jalebis at a Delhi wedding! We’ll keep you posted, promise! More as the masala unfolds...
